item.title: Top Shelf 14-Passenger Party Bus Rental
item.description: Sit back and enjoy the ride in this top shelf party bus in Indianapolis for you and up to a group of 14. Rent this for a minimum of 4 hours and your driver will take you wherever you’d like to go, whether it’s a tailgate, concert, sports event, or a networking or teambuilding event with your clients. Don’t worry about logistics, because the party bus has that taken care of.

image.alt: Top Shelf 14-Passenger Party Bus Rental

item.title: Indy Walking Tours
item.description: Indy Walking Tours is a guided 90 minute comprehensive walking tour through the city streets of Indianapolis. Our easy stroll through the city streets of Indianapolis will cover the: Indiana War Memorial Historic District, Mass Ave, the Wholesale District, City Market, the Indiana Soldiers' and Sailors' Monument and various interesting points in between. In addition to learning about the rich history of Indianapolis, you'll also hear a story of local true crime, funny anecdotes, little known folklore, the inspirations and meanings behind historical statues, architecture and monuments, and more. Be sure to wear comfy walking shoes as our walk will cover 1.5 miles. This is the most comprehensive and interesting tour in Indy and a fun activity for all ages. If you are planning for a large group or just looking for more booking options please contact us. Min requirement of 4 people for all tours. If 4 people are not booked within 24 hours of your tour, you will receive a refund.

image.alt: Indy Walking Tours

item.title: Indianapolis Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Phantoms Walking Tour
item.description:
Discover Indianapolis’s most spine-chilling secrets on the city’s #1 Ghost Tour—an authentic, thrilling, and hauntingly fun experience! Join us for a bone-chilling walk through the most haunted and historic spots in Indianapolis. Led by expert local guides—Indianapolis’s official haunted history experts—you’ll hear real, hair-raising tales of the city’s dark past and lingering spirits.
Offered nightly year-round, our tours uncover centuries of wicked history as we visit Indianapolis’s most haunted buildings and bars. Hear captivating ghost stories, from infamous witch trials to tragic murders. Wander the haunted streets after dark as our guides bring eerie tales to life at iconic sites like the Indiana Repertory Theatre, the Indiana State Capitol, and Monument Circle.
Each step reveals hidden history and authentic hauntings. Though we won’t enter buildings, you'll stand on haunted ground, feeling the energy of Indianapolis’s spooky past beneath your feet!

image.alt: Indianapolis Ghosts: Haunts, Spirits, and Phantoms Walking Tour

item.title: Smartphone-Guided Walking Tour of Downtown Indianapolis Sights & Stories
item.description: Take a locally guided tour across Indianapolis in the privacy of your own group—and at the comfort of your own pace. Led by your smartphone, you’ll visit the city’s most iconic spots, learn about their stories, discover fun facts and trivia, and explore the city on-foot with the knowledge of a local in your pocket. The tour starts when you’re ready to dive in!

image.alt: Smartphone-Guided Walking Tour of Downtown Indianapolis Sights & Stories

item.title: Massachusetts Avenue Food Tour
item.description: Taste your way through one of Indianapolis' up-and-coming culinary scenes on a walking food tour of Massachusetts Avenue. In this revitalized district with both a historic and industrial vibe, follow a foodie guide to some of the city's best locally owned eateries to sample dishes ranging from gourmet Midwestern classic and hearty German fare to microbrews and desserts baked with seasonal produce. In between bites, you'll also get a good-sized helping of Indiana history.

image.alt: Massachusetts Avenue Food Tour

item.title: Axe Throwing in Indianapolis
item.description: At Bad Axe Throwing Indianapolis, you can learn the sport of axe throwing—a traditional Canadian backyard pastime that's gaining popularity in cities across the U.S.—with a talented axe throwing coach. This activity is ideal for all skill levels and you can choose from multiple times to best suit your schedule. Plus, an axe throwing safety briefing and hands-on instruction are provided for a worry-free experience.

image.alt: Axe Throwing in Indianapolis

item.title: Top Shelf 14-Passenger Brewery Tour
item.description: We have excellent reviews! We know to treat people like we'd like to be treated. We are also very flexible.

image.alt: Top Shelf 14-Passenger Brewery Tour

item.title: Indiana Pacers Basketball Game Ticket at Gainbridge Fieldhouse
item.description:
Momentum is gathering at Gainbridge Fieldhouse, the energy in the stands is electric, as last year’s Eastern Conference finalists, the Indiana Pacers, look to go one better this year. Gainbridge Fieldhouse is the place to be this year for all NBA fans, you don’t want to miss this!
Consistently rated amongst the best arenas in the NBA, Gainbridge Fieldhouse is the perfect place to live the NBA experience. With panoramic views, you won’t miss any of the action as NBA All-Star Tyrese Halliburton leads the Pacers in what is sure to be some of the most exciting basketball played this season.
Nestled in the heart of downtown Indianapolis, Gainbridge Fieldhouse is considered one of the premier venues in the NBA, not only due to it being a purpose-built basketball arena, but also because of the first class amenities on offer and it’s proximity to Indianapolis’s downtown cultural hub. Witness the thrill of an NBA game first hand and be part of a vibrant community with this trip of a lifetime!

image.alt: Indiana Pacers Basketball Game Ticket at Gainbridge Fieldhouse

item.title: Top Shelf 14-Passenger Winery Tour
item.description: We have excellent reviews! We know to treat people like we'd like to be treated. We are also very flexible.

item.title: Bike and Brews Seeing Indy on an E-Bike
item.description:
Indianapolis is a special place to explore while on a Pedego electric bike, particularly through the eyes of a long-time resident. Our experienced tour guide will ensure you see the numerous historical sites that define Indianapolis. The tour will be along the Indianapolis Cultural Trail and the White River Parkway, bike/pedestrian only paths, providing riders protection from busy streets or highways,
Additionally our guide will offer opportunities for guests to receive several high resolution photos of themselves at some of the city's most memorable vistas.

image.alt: Bike and Brews Seeing Indy on an E-Bike

item.title: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Indianapolis by Wacky Walks
item.description: Use an app to explore Indianapolis in this fun royal scavenger hunt! In Wacky Walks, you will compete in royal tournaments to determine a King or Queen throughout the game. The King/Queen will lead the team in finding items around the city and doing challenges for points. Take a photo of the item or completing the challenges through the app. The goal of the game is to keep your King/Queen title the longest and gain as many points as possible during your game. You can play for as long as you choose, in any area of the city you'd prefer. A remote host will be chatting with you throughout the game if you need help. Come play Wacky Walks in Indianapolis today!

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt Adventure in Indianapolis by Wacky Walks

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Indianapolis Airport IND
item.description: Don’t worry about finding your own way from Indianapolis International Airport to your area accommodation—this private arrival transfer service makes getting around easy. After landing, meet your chauffeur directly at the airport, receive their help with your luggage, and get settled aboard your private vehicle. Then, head straight to your accommodation; you can choose from a range of destinations, including the Indianapolis Motor Speedway area.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Indianapolis Airport IND

item.title: Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Holly Jolly Hunt is a scavenger hunt that is played using an app on your smartphone, that brings your entire family and friends together for holiday cheer. During the adventure you’ll be seeking out all the traditional, and even the non-traditional holiday items we all see this time of year around the city. You’ll get points for each item you find. The goal is to capture as many items as you can in order to score as many points as possible and get 1st place on the leaderboard. Along the way you’ll be asked to perform silly holiday themed tasks meant to bring laughter and smiles to everyone involved. Come play with us. Young or old, this is a scavenger hunt for everyone that enjoys this time of year. We promise you will create holiday memories that you will not forget! Holly Jolly Hunt can be played in any city!

image.alt: Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: Private Departure Transfer from Indianapolis Airport IND
item.description: At the end of your Indianapolis getaway, don’t worry about finding your own way to the airport: This private departure service makes getting around easy. Meet your driver at your area accommodation at a time that works best for your travel schedule and get settled aboard your comfortable, luxury vehicle. Then, embark on one last trip through the city and directly to your departure terminal.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer from Indianapolis Airport IND

item.title: Indianapolis Scavenger Hunt by Zombie Scavengers
item.description: Use an app to survive a zombie apocalypse in Indianapolis. In Zombie Scavengers, explore the city however you'd like to search for items needed to survive a zombie apocalypse. You'll get points for finding these items. You can also do some zombie themed challenges for points on the app as well. Strategize in order to get the most points and survive the apocalypse. Your remote host will be there for you via chat if you need anything. Can you survive the apocalypse in Indianapolis.?

image.alt: Indianapolis Scavenger Hunt by Zombie Scavengers

item.title: Smartphone Guided Indianapolis Downtown Sites Audio Walking Tour
item.description:
Walk through the soul of the city and discover it’s iconic landmarks of Indianapolis. Go at your own pace, anytime. See the state house, soldiers and sailor monument, Indiana War Memorial & Museum, university park, Obelisk Square, war memorials, churches, statues, fountains, libraries and so much more. You’ll see that and hear the stories of the people that made the this city.
Why choose this tour? Great price for a great experience! See the sites at your own pace. The tour is location aware and plays as you walk. Stop anytime. Continue anytime.

image.alt: Smartphone Guided Indianapolis Downtown Sites Audio Walking Tour

item.title: Indianapolis City to Indianapolis Airport (IND) - Departure Private Transfer
item.description: Ensure a smooth departure from Indianapolis by pre-booking your one-way private transfer from Indianapolis to Indianapolis International Airport. Avoid the stress of trying to find a taxi or a shuttle last minute. Your driver will meet you directly at your hotel. Sit back, relax, and enjoy a smooth transfer to the airport.

image.alt: Indianapolis City to Indianapolis Airport (IND) - Departure Private Transfer

item.title: Private Departure Transfer - to Indianapolis Airport (IND) by SUV
item.description: Why stress waiting for unreliable taxis or shuttle services to pick you up from your hotel? Ensure peace of mind with a private transfer to the Indianapolis Airport. Get to the airport with time to spare for your luggage check in and security clearance. Transfer services are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Choose from a luxury sedan transfer for three people, a sport utility vehicle transfer that carries up to five passengers.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer - to Indianapolis Airport (IND) by SUV

item.title: Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis City - Round-Trip Private Transfer
item.description:
Book your Private Round-Trip Transfer from Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis hotel or address and return.
Don't go through all the hassle of waiting in a long taxi or shared shuttles queues and use our private, door to door airport transfer.
Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
• Meeting with a Nameplate • We track your Flight • Door-to-door Service • No Hidden Charges • Clean cars & Professional drivers

image.alt: Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis City - Round-Trip Private Transfer

item.title: Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis Arrival Transfer
item.description:
Comfort Arrival Transfer from Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis City up to 8 passengers. (For party over 7 passengers can be provided one big minibus or two minivans).
All Vehicles fully licensed and insured. Our cars are equipped with all necessary facilities for a trip to any part of the world under any weather conditions, including additional fastenings for sports and other equipment.
On request for your tourists, we have child seats for all ages, soft drinks and free Wi Fi in the lounge. Vehicles are clean inside and outside; our drivers’ always are well dressed and always pay attention to our guests. They will meet you with a name sign; help with luggage and on arrival to the hotel.

image.alt: Indianapolis Airport (IND) to Indianapolis Arrival Transfer

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by 3Quest Challenge
item.description: Walk around Indianapolis while completing the 3Quest Challenge scavenger hunt. Use an app to find a list of objects around the city and participate in fun challenges for points. Collect points and take a look at your score compared to others around the country! All our Scavenger hunts have a live remote host to help along the way. Come out and explore with us in Indianapolis.

image.alt: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by 3Quest Challenge

item.title: Fun Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by Operation City Quest
item.description: To play Operation City Quest in Indianapolis, you'll use an app to gather points by completing exciting tasks and finding objects around the city in any order you choose. Use strategy to gain the most points on the app's leaderboard and beat out other teams. Our scavenger hunt has a remote host that will help throughout the game via chat. Let's get competing in Indianapolis.

image.alt: Fun Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by Operation City Quest

item.title: Private Professional Photoshoot in Indianapolis
item.description:
Get ready for a remarkable journey through the colorful and vibrant landscapes of Phoenix, AZ! We're thrilled to guide you on a leisurely exploration of our city's famed sites, presenting the most scenic landmarks Phoenix has to offer, alongside unveiling hidden treasures that many have yet to discover.
Beyond capturing your moments with our professional photography, we're excited to share exclusive insights and tips to enhance your visit. Dive into Phoenix's best-kept secrets with us, making every snapshot of your trip unforgettable. We look forward to meeting you and starting this extraordinary adventure together!

image.alt: Private Professional Photoshoot in Indianapolis

item.title: Fun City Scavenger Hunt in Indianapolis by Crazy Dash
item.description: Explore Indianapolis in a creative and fun way with this app-led scavenger hunt. You won't be following around a tour guide or have to share the experience with a group of strangers. Instead, work with your private group to perform challenges and take photos for evidence, making your way around Indianapolis.
